alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 9:29PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Arapahoe, northeastern Denver and south central Adams Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 928 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, or 22 miles northeast of Denver, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Aurora, eastern Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Bennett, Watkins, Manila Village and Strasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
